ComicInfo.Summary:
Boston Surgeon Christopher Boldt is secretly the son of one of the city's most notorious gangsters. Unfortunately, it's no longer a secret. And on the eve of Chris announcing a historic run for City Council, he must fend off an attempted hit by his father - Orin Paige. But violence runs in the family, and Chris is a natural. Now, at the end of a long night of blood, Chris comes face to face with his father, the man that helped bring him into the world...and the man that tried to take him out of it. And if Chris survives his fight for vengeance, can he reckon with the man he's had to become to achieve it?
